name: Build and Test

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    strategy:
      matrix:
        php-versions: ['8.2']
        node-version: ['18.x']
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v3
    
    - name: Setup PHP ${{ matrix.php-versions }}
      uses: shivammathur/setup-php@v2
      with:
        php-version: ${{ matrix.php-versions }}
        extensions: mbstring, intl
        tools: composer:v2
    
    - name: Validate composer.json and composer.lock
      run: composer validate --strict
      
    - name: Cache Composer packages
      id: composer-cache
      uses: actions/cache@v3
      with:
        path: vendor
        key: ${{ runner.os }}-php-${{ hashFiles('**/composer.lock') }}
        restore-keys: |
          ${{ runner.os }}-php-
    
    - name: Install PHP dependencies
      run: composer install --prefer-dist --no-progress
    
    - name: Setup Node.js ${{ matrix.node-version }}
      uses: actions/setup-node@v3
      with:
        node-version: ${{ matrix.node-version }}
        cache: 'npm'
        cache-dependency-path: assets/js/package-lock.json
    
    - name: Install JS dependencies
      run: |
        cd assets/js
        npm ci
    
    - name: Build frontend
      run: |
        cd assets/js
        npm run build
    
    # Add more steps for testing here if needed
    
    - name: Package plugin
      run: |
        mkdir -p dist
        zip -r dist/wp-activity-tracker.zip . -x "*.git*" -x "node_modules/*" -x "assets/js/node_modules/*" -x "dist/*"
    
    - name: Upload artifact
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v3
      with:
        name: wp-activity-tracker
        path: dist/wp-activity-tracker.zip
